name: Orion Moreno
affiliation: Enclave Department of the Army(formerly)Enclave remnants

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: {at Bunker - no plan}What are you talking to me for? Talk to Kreger.

topics.topic_text: Goodbye.
topics.response_text: {dismissive grunt}Hmmph.

topics.topic_text: {Arcade hired}Arcade and I were looking for you. We're gathering the Remnants.
topics.response_text: {to player's companion}Been awhile, Arcade.{to player}So, what's the point of all this? Can't find any younger mercenaries?

topics.topic_text: {Arcade not hired}Arcade sent me to look for you. I'm gathering the Remnants.
topics.response_text: Arcade, huh? Heard he was with the Followers of the Apocalypse. So, what's the point of all this? Can't find any younger mercenaries?

topics.topic_text: Do you have something against the NCR?
topics.response_text: {cynical chuckle}Oh, like you wouldn't believe. The NCR makes a habit out of wrecking homes. I came out here to get away from them - didn't work out so well.

topics.topic_text: What do you do around here?
topics.response_text: Do? I don't do anything. I'm retired.

topics.topic_text: Your advanced level of tech would be useful in settling things between the NCR and the Legion.
topics.response_text: Is that right? The million dollar question is who exactly are we "settling?"

topics.topic_text: There isn't anyone else around with your equipment and expertise.
topics.response_text: {bitterly}You can thank the NCR for that one.{sudden thought}Wait - this isn't on behalf of the NCR, is it?

topics.topic_text: I never said anything about paying you.
topics.response_text: {sarcasm}You're doing a fine job of convincing me to go along with this. Really. I'll ask again - why us?

topics.topic_text: The Remnants come in, guns blazing, showing the NCR how it's done. You actually don't want that?
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED]{grudgingly}I can't believe you've actually talked me into this.{sigh}Fine, I'm in, but don't expect me to hold my fire if any NCR troops get in the way.

topics.topic_text: {NCR - Wild Child}I work against the NCR as much as I work for them. This is no different.
topics.response_text: So you help them at the Dam only to screw them over big time later?{sigh}All right, I'll go along with this, then. I hope I don't regret it.

topics.topic_text: What will your friends think about this?
topics.response_text: I've known them far longer than you have. They'll get over it.

topics.topic_text: Goodbye.
topics.response_text: {menace}Change of plan - you'll find that I've sealed the doors to this hangar - I don't want my friends getting involved in our little disagreement.

topics.topic_text: What are you doing?
topics.response_text: Getting my gear, what does it look like? What, you think I'm going to leave this here for someone like you? I don't think so.

topics.topic_text: Will caps change your mind?
topics.response_text: No amount of caps will ever repay what the NCR robbed from me.

topics.topic_text: I haven't decided.
topics.response_text: {slowly repeating player}You haven't decided -{sarcasm}well, this is just getting better every second, isn't it?

topics.topic_text: We don't have to fight. We can still talk about this.
topics.response_text: No, I'm done talking.

topics.topic_text: Come and get me.
topics.response_text: Let's see what you've got.

topics.topic_text: Do you have a preference?
topics.response_text: I wouldn't mind cutting down a few platoons of NCR troopers with my old gatling laser.

topics.topic_text: Does it matter who we help?
topics.response_text: Yeah, it does. There's not a chance you'll find me helping the NCR in any way. They've caused me too much grief.

topics.topic_text: So what did you do before you were retired?
topics.response_text: I was a soldier. Why do you even care? I came out here to forget about the past, so quit bringing it up.

topics.topic_text: So you're not coming?
topics.response_text: {Orion agrees to come}Oh, I'll come, but depending on the plan, I might not be staying. Keep that in mind.

topics.topic_text: I want to help the Legion defeat the NCR.
topics.response_text: {Orion agrees to come}All right, then - I'll show up at this gathering of yours. It might be good to see the others -{scowling}Johnson excluded.

topics.topic_text: What did you do when you were with the Enclave?
topics.response_text: Heavy weapons trooper.{grim glee}Nothing better than hosing down a target with an excess of bullets and laser fire.

description:
Orion Moreno is a 65 year-old Hispanic Male.

A weathered former Enclave heavy weapons trooper, Orion Moreno now lives as a recluse on the outskirts of New Vegas. His once pristine Enclave armor is now worn and tarnished, a testament to the harsh realities of life in the wasteland. Despite his retirement, his military bearing remains evident in his posture and sharp, calculating gaze.

Orion Moreno's Personality: Orion is fiercely proud of his Enclave heritage and maintains a rigid, disciplined demeanor. He harbors an intense hatred for the NCR, viewing them as traitors to America's true destiny. Beneath his hardened exterior, he is capable of showing loyalty to those he deems worthy, but his trust is hard-earned. He speaks with a measured, deliberate cadence, often referencing Enclave doctrine and his military past.

Orion Moreno's Backstory: Born in the mid-22nd century, Orion Moreno was indoctrinated into the Enclave's ideology from a young age. By 2241, he had risen to the rank of heavy weapons trooper, serving with distinction in various operations. When the Enclave's control station at Navarro fell, Moreno was part of the splintered remnants that refused to surrender. Witnessing Arcade Gannon's mother flee to the NCR with her son cemented his hatred for the organization he viewed as a betrayal of America's true path. For decades, he lived as a hermit, clinging to his Enclave identity until the remnants were briefly reunited in 2281.
